s278: Tenth year. Zhang Han made agreement with Chu to surrender, not yet decided, Xiang Yu agreed then attacked him.
s288: Eleventh month. Xiang Yu and Zhang Han agreed to meet at Yin Xu, Zhang Han and others already surrendered, made covenant with them, made Han Yong king.
s294: Fifteenth year. Shen Yang took Henan, surrendered to Chu.
s298: Twelfth month. Made Qin surrender colonel Yi and chief clerk Xin supreme generals, commanding Qin surrender troops.
s299: Twenty-first year. Zhao King Xie remained in state. Chen Yu fled and resided at Nan Pi.
s301: Twenty-fifth year. Attacked Wu Guan, broke it.
s311: Twenty-sixth year. Attacked and took Yao and Lan Tian. Using Liu Hou's strategy, without fighting all surrendered.
s319: Twenty-third year. Zhang Er followed Chu west into Qin.
s321: Twenty-seventh year. Han first year, Qin prince Zi Ying surrendered. Pei Gong entered and broke Xianyang, pacified Qin, returned army to Bashang, awaited feudal lords' agreement.
s323: Fifteenth year. Followed Xiang Yu to conquer territory, then entered the pass
s328: Fifteenth year. Yu falsely dug pits and killed Qin surrender soldiers 200,000 at Xin'an.
s377: First month. Divided Guanzhong as Han.
s383: Eighteenth year. Changed to Western Wei.
s388: Second year. Moved capital to southern Jiangling.
s389: Western Chu Lord Bo, Xiang Yu beginning, commanded the realm's mandates, appointed eighteen kings.
s390: King Wu Rui beginning, former Fan Lord.
s391: King Gong Ao beginning, former Chu Zhu Guo.
s392: King Ying Bu beginning, former Chu general.
s393: King Zhang Er beginning, former Chu general.
s394: Twenty-seventh year. King Zhao Xie beginning, former Zhao king.
s395: King Tian Du beginning, former Qi general.
s396: King Tian An beginning, former Qi general.
s397: Twentieth year. King Tian Shi beginning, former Qi king.
s398: Second month. Han King beginning, former Pei Gong.
s399: King Zhang Han beginning, former Qin general.
s400: King Sima Xin beginning, former Qin general.
s401: King Dong Yi beginning, former Qin general.
s402: King Zang Chu beginning, former Yan general.
s403: Thirty-first year. King Han Guang beginning, former Yan king.
s404: Nineteenth year. King Wei Bao beginning, former Wei king.
